John Fahey

Pairing on npm

Written by John Fahey on August 12, 2014.

I paired with fellow Code Fellows student, Mandi Grant on a node package we hadn't used before. The node package we used was URIjs. This package allows you to mutate, clean urls' domain and directories. You can also clean up the the url and work with relative paths.

We used it to simulate what your url would look like in Google search results:



https://github.com/MJGrant/sea-b20-day4-PairProgramming/pull/1

We used Browserify and Express to create this program. Pairing is a great way to learn more about another programmers process and thought progress. Mandi was great to pair with.
